title: New: Flatsound – I'm So Concerned About The Ending That I Don't Even Know The Plot
body:
**Flatsound** knows how to cut right to the core.

Whether he’s waxing lyrical about sexual fetishes or as in this case, the emotional attachment to his mother, **Mitch Welling** has the rare gift of portraying a magnificent connection between the music and real life. With a new album soon, he’s released a short teaser containing six tracks that are, in his own words, the product of one night recording directly to cassette. Check out _I’m So Concerned About The Ending That I Don’t Even Know The Plot_ and grab the full release [here](http://adf.ly/7mwJh).
